#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

  * [http://subversion.tigris.org/ SVN] checkout the [http://code.google.com/p/cccatcher/source/checkout Source]
  * in Flex Builder -> File -> Import -> Flex Project -> Import project from: Project folder: _yourCheckoutDir_ -> Finish
  * Flex Builder -> Run -> Debug -> CCCatcher
  * Drag some mp3 on it & double click!
